extendedInfo.description: Exercise your brain, enjoy Sudoku! With hints that teach and daily games at 16 levels you will love Sudoku. Supports phones and tablets. Our Sudoku tutorial, extensive feature set, and advanced multi-stage hint system offer something for everyone. The more you play, the more you will enjoy Sudoku!For unlimited puzzles, check out our other Sudoku product: Enjoy Sudoku (paid).Our multi-stage hint system starts with a gentle reminder to get you back on track and works up to an illustration of the exact technique to use and how it applies to the current board. Use our hints to ease those frustrating moments and to learn how to be a better player.Features include:* Daily puzzles at 16 difficulty levels* Tutorial teaches you new techniques* UI optimized for fewer touches* Supports phones and tablets* Multi-level undo and redo* Automatic or manual pencil marks* Supports keyboard and trackball* Large easy to read digits* Advanced techniques, including X-Wings,   sashimi fish, and coloring* Choice of six color schemes* Save your game while you try alternatives* Highlighting helps you discover patterns* Game clock; compares your time to others* Avoids graphic frills that distract* Choice of digit styles, including   Kanji and HanziAll games are true Sudoku, with symmetry and a single solution that can be discovered by logic alone. If you doubt that a Sudoku puzzle can be solved by logic, simply have the hint system explain it to you step by step.If you enjoy Sudoku daily, this is the app for you![suduko,soduko,sudoko,sodoku,free]

reviews.title: Excellent game play
reviews.comment: Great app .   Tutorial helps you learn new techniques.  Game play is fast after you\'ve added your pencil marks.  My only complaint is that there\'s no option to start with all pencil marks filled instead of empty or smart autofilled.
reviews.author: Bruce Hill

reviews.title: Powerful learning tool
reviews.comment: I like this sudoku app simply because of how easy it makes learning this game beyond the obvious logic. Very handy tools and features.
reviews.author: Adrian Ortiz

reviews.title: Abdul
reviews.comment: Great app. It has tutorials to hone your sudoku skills just what i was looking for. Love it.
reviews.author: Abdul Samad

reviews.title: Good!
reviews.comment: I like the challenge in your puzzles. The fiendish, diabolical, and nightmare levels live up to its name. Keep up the good work.
reviews.author: Kah Yip Tham

reviews.title: Love this app
reviews.comment: I have been using this for 5 years and it has helped me increase my brain function.  Easy to use and I love the features.
reviews.author: Tish Shirey

reviews.title: What happened?
reviews.comment: I always enjoyed the last two, nightmare & diabolical, and now they\'re super easy! Not a challenge anymore. Definitely a glitch. Emailed creator but no response : (
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Been using it for a number of years.. Always reliable
reviews.author: Paulo Branco

reviews.title: Love Sudoku
reviews.comment: Really like the daily version

reviews.title: Awesome sudoku
reviews.comment: This really is the best sudoku game there is it cant be beaten and cant be improved, what more would anyone want. Three cheers for jason :-)

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Brilliant tutorial

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Excellent time killer!

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: Love the tutorials and the way the hints give you tips to help you solve the next one yourself (rather than just giving you a number). The highlighting when you select a digit also alleviates the tedium and stupid mistakes of paper puzzles.
reviews.author: William Bennett

reviews.title: Best sudoku app out there
reviews.comment: I like the iOS and Android versions. Wish there was a Windows phone 8 version as well.
reviews.author: Arvind Gopal

reviews.title: Best sudoku ever
reviews.comment: I\'ve tried others but think this is the best.  I have it on all my devices!

reviews.title: Totally addicted
reviews.comment: Love this game, glad its free. Wish I knew exactly what time the new games switch over
